description:
Step to reproduce:
1 Go to dashboard then create new instance

Actual result:
App return error message "Unable to create server"

Environment:
Centos7, Openstack mitaka

Note:

title: Get error 'Unable to create server' when launch new instance

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hanguyen1088

comments.content:
The provided information is not sufficient, it just tells that openstack glance is too slow to respond. 

Might be something else is not working in your environment.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rsritesh

comments.content: Automatically discovered version mitaka in description. If this is incorrect, please update the description to include 'nova version: ...'
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sdague

comments.content: [Expired for OpenStack Compute (nova) because there has been no activity for 60 days.]
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~janitor
